title: JavaScript, Python and Java Among Tops in Language Rankings
author: Darryl K Taft
description: RedMonk and TIOBE rankings reveal stability in top languages, with JavaScript and Python leading, while C faces challenges and newer languages like Ballerina show increased traction.
cntitle: JavaScript、Python 和 Java 位列语言排行榜前列
cndescription: RedMonk 和 TIOBE 排名显示顶级语言的稳定性，JavaScript 和 Python 领先，而 C 面临挑战，像 Ballerina 这样的新语言显示出越来越大的吸引力。
